title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 174.11 - New york state inspection reminder sticker
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 174.11 - New york state inspection reminder sticker

State Regulations

The New York State inspection reminder sticker (VS-1083)
may be displayed on the inside of the front windshield in the upper center not
more than six inches from the top of the windshield. The sticker may be issued, on a voluntary basis, by a New York State official inspection station to for
hire vehicles licensed by the New York City Taxi and Limousine Commission that
are subject to three inspections in each calendar year. The sticker shall
display the date that the next inspection is due. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
174.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
